admreg: Europe and Central Asia,Europe and Central Asia
trustfund:
TF038920-KYRGYZ REPUBLIC - SUPERVISION
            OF IRRIGATION REHABILITATION PROJECT,TF039254-KRYGZ REPLUBLIC - IRRIGATION
            REHAB PROJECT,TF038128-KYRGYZ REPUBLIC - IRRIGATION REHAB.,TF038124-KYRGYZ REPUBLIC - IRRIGATION REHABILITATION,TF034812-ECA REGION - IRRIGATION
            PROJECTS (KRYGYZ REP.,KAZAKSTAN,,TF034327-KAZAKHSTAN - IRRIGATION AND
            DRAINAGE PROJECT,TF033222-EASTERN EUROPE REGION -
            IRRIGATION AND DRAINAGE PROJECTS,TF027112-PHRD -IRRIGATION REHABILITATION PROJECT

abstracts.cdata!:
The Irrigation Rehabilitation Project
            aims at increasing the productivity of irrigated agriculture
            in the project area through improved water supply.  The
            project consists of three components.  i) Rehabilitation of
            irrigation infrastructure will support emergency repairs and
            selective low-cost rehabilitation of inter-farm irrigation
            infrastructure.  This includes the rehabilitation,
            completion, or improvement in monitoring systems of up to 12
            irrigation dams.  It will also support inter-farm canal
            networks to improve drainage.  ii) Capacity building will
            include implementation support of the Project Implementation
            Unit which handles the daily management, administration, and
            coordination of the project.  This component will also
            support institutional development by financing office
            equipment, machinery, software to assist oblast and rayon
            offices in the effective planning, operation, maintenance,
            and management of irrigation and dam systems.  It will also
            support various training activities and study tours.  iii)
            Incremental maintenance will assist with the financing of
            maintenance works for inter-farm irrigation infrastructure
            associated with the subprojects.
